'''"Consommé Purete"''' is a [[Special Dish]] that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Consommé]] with [[Neuvillette]]. The [[recipe]] for Consommé is obtainable from [[Sanguinetti]] in [[Hotel Debord]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

"Consommé Purete" increases all party members' CRIT Rate by '''20'''% and CRIT DMG by '''20'''% for 300s. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
